name: list_directory
description: Lists the names of files and subdirectories directly within a specified directory. Can optionally ignore entries matching provided glob patterns.

name: read_file
description: Adds a file to the session's reference list for inclusion in the prompt. It does not read the file content directly.

name: search_file_content
description: Searches for a regular expression pattern within the content of files in a specified directory (or current working directory). Can filter files by a glob pattern. Returns the lines containing matches, along with their file paths and line numbers. Total results limited to 20,000 matches like VSCode.

name: glob
description: Efficiently finds files matching specific glob patterns (e.g., `src/**/*.ts`, `**/*.md`), returning absolute paths sorted by modification time (newest first). Ideal for quickly locating files based on their name or path structure, especially in large codebases.

name: write_file
description: Writes content to a specified file.

name: web_fetch
description: Processes content from URLs embedded in a prompt.

name: read_many_files
description: Resolves file paths based on glob patterns and adds them to the session's reference list.

name: save_memory
description: Saves specific information to long-term memory.

name: google_web_search
description: Performs a web search using Google Search and returns the results.

name: edit_todos
description: Edits the list of TODO items directly within the session data.

todos.description: A list of TODO items to edit. Each item is a dictionary containing 'title', 'description', and 'checked'.

title.description: The title of the TODO item.

description.description: A detailed description of the TODO item.

checked.description: A flag indicating whether the TODO item is completed.

name: delete_todos
description: Deletes the list of TODO items from the current session data.

name: read_session_turns
description: Reads a specified range of turns from a target session's history.

session_id.description: The ID of the session to read from.

start_turn.description: The starting turn index to read.

end_turn.description: The ending turn index to read.

name: replace_session_turns
description: Replaces a specified range of turns in a target session's history with a summary.

session_id.description: The ID of the session to modify.

start_turn.description: The starting turn index of the range to replace.

end_turn.description: The ending turn index of the range to replace.

summary.description: The summary text to replace the turns with.
